titles.title: There are days when I feel

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There are days when I feel
The best of me is ready to begin
Then there's days when I feel
I'm letting go and soaring on the wind

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
'Cause I've learned in laughter or in pain
How to survive!

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I get on my knees! I get on my knees!
There I am before the Love that changes me
See I don't know how but there's power
When I'm on my knees

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I can be in a crowd
Or by myself and almost anywhere
When I feel there's a need
To talk with God He is Emmanuel

verse.name: p2
verse.lines:
When I close my eyes, no darkness there
There's only light!
